title: The ONLY Garden Planting Schedule Youll EVER Need

tasks.task: Create a garden planting schedule for different zones.
subtasks: Research popular vegetables for the list.
Include all 12 months on the calendar.
Note average frost dates for each zone.
Categorize planting times (indoors, outdoors, direct sowing).
Indicate harvesting times for each vegetable.
Design the schedule as a 24-inch by 36-inch poster.
Post the schedule online for zones 3-9.
Encourage viewers to use the resource.
